headline: Cessna Caravan Celebrates 40 Years of Adventures as One of the Most Versatile Aircraft in the Industry
summary: WICHITA, Kan., March 31, 2025--Textron Aviation today announced that the company is celebrating the 40th anniversary of the Cessna Caravan single-engine utility turboprop with customers throughout the year, recognizing its growth and popularity throughout the world during the past four decades.

headline: Textron Aviation and Aeromot Execute Cooperation Agreement to Benefit Cessna Caravan Owners and Operators Worldwide
summary: WICHITA, Kan., March 31, 2025--Textron Aviation and Aeromot execute Cooperation Agreement to benefit Cessna Caravan owners and operators worldwide.
